abstract: Speculation is swirling that the world largest’s miner, BHP Billiton, is prepping a $90 a share offer for Anadarko — moving Anadarko stock in pre-market trading.
snippet: Speculation is swirling that the world largest’s miner, BHP Billiton, is prepping a $90 a share offer for Anadarko — moving Anadarko stock in pre-market trading.
lead_paragraph: Speculation that BHP Billiton may make a play for Anadarko Petroleum of Houston is quickly moving shares in the company.

headline.main: Anadarko Shares Surge on Deal Talk
